summary: The module provides object-oriented representations of cylindrical plasma equilibria, encapsulating the mathematical description of magnetic field and pressure profiles in a cylindrical geometry. It includes implementations such as a force‑free flux rope, offering methods to evaluate field components, equilibrium conditions, and related physical quantities.
business_intent: Enable researchers and engineers to model and analyze magnetized plasma configurations in cylindrical settings for applications like fusion confinement, space plasma studies, and astrophysical jet simulations.
